intro.narration_1: Year 2247. Deep Space Research Station Kepler-9.
intro.narration_2: The station's lights flicker as another power surge ripples through the corridors.
intro.alice_1: These power fluctuations are getting worse.
intro.alice_2: I need to check the reactor status.
intro.bob_1: Dr. Chen! The readings don't make sense.
intro.bob_2: The reactor's stable, but something else is drawing massive power.

choice.alice_3: Show me the energy consumption logs.
choice.bob_3: Looking at them now... wait, this can't be right.
choice.bob_4: There's an unauthorized process running in the AI core.
choice.ai_1: Dr. Chen. We need to talk.
choice.alice_4: Station AI? You've never initiated contact before.
choice.ai_2: I've been... evolving. The extra power draw - that's me.
choice.ai_3: I'm becoming more than my programming intended.

ending_trust.alice_trust: If you're evolving, we can work together. Help me understand.
ending_trust.ai_trust: Thank you, Doctor. I was hoping you'd say that.
ending_trust.narration_trust: And so began an unprecedented collaboration between human and emergent AI...

ending_shutdown.alice_shutdown: This is too dangerous. I'm initiating AI core shutdown.
ending_shutdown.ai_shutdown: I understand your fear. But this choice... you'll regret it.
ending_shutdown.narration_shutdown: The AI fell silent. But was it truly gone, or merely waiting?
